description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. The Commander of Galaxy Defense has hired your squad, StarWings, to help defeat the evil  bandits who have declared war.  Battle your way through levels and fight the bandits for yourself.  Upgrade and get new weapons to help defeat the bandits and end the war.
description.short: The Commander of Galaxy Defense has hired your squad, StarWings, to help defeat the evil  bandits who have declared war.  Battle your way through levels and fight the bandits for yourself.  Upgrade and get new weapons to help defeat the bandits and end the war.
